# network interface settings; autogenerated
# Please do NOT modify this file directly, unless you know what
# you're doing.
#
# If you want to manage parts of the network configuration manually,
# please utilize the 'source' or 'source-directory' directives to do
# so.
# PVE will preserve these directives, but will NOT read its network
# configuration from sourced files, so do not attempt to move any of
# the PVE managed interfaces into external files!

source /etc/network/interfaces.d/*

auto lo
iface lo inet loopback

iface lo inet6 loopback

auto enp0s31f6
iface enp0s31f6 inet static
        address 142.132.216.83/26
        gateway 142.132.216.65
        up route add -net 142.132.216.64 netmask 255.255.255.192 gw 142.132.216.65 dev enp0s31f6
# route 142.132.216.64/26 via 142.132.216.65

iface enp0s31f6 inet6 static
        address 2a01:4f8:262:44d1::2/64
        gateway fe80::1

iface eth0 inet manual

auto vmbr0
iface vmbr0 inet static
        address 192.168.0.1/24
        bridge-ports none
        bridge-stp off
        bridge-fd 0

        post-up   echo 1 > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/ip_forward
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -s '192.168.0.0/24' -o enp0s31f6 -j MASQUERADE
        post-down iptables -t nat -D POSTROUTING -s '192.168.0.0/24' -o enp0s31f6 -j MASQUERADE
        post-up   iptables -t raw -I PREROUTING -i fwbr+ -j CT --zone 1
        post-down iptables -t raw -D PREROUTING  -i fwbr+ -j CT --zone 1

        # PORT FORWARDING
        # SSH
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 30022 -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:22
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 30022 -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:22
        # Docker API: 2375, 2376, 2377, 4789:udp, 7946:tcp/udp
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 2375  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:2375
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 2375  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:2375
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 2376  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:2376
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 2376  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:2376
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 2377  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:2377
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 2377  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:2377
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 7946  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:7946
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 7946  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:7946
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p udp --dport 7946  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:7946
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p udp --dport 7946  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:7946
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p udp --dport 4789  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:4789
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p udp --dport 4789  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:4789

        # Portainer porst: 8000, 9000, 9001, 9443
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 8000  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:8000
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 8000  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:8000
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 9000  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:9000
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 9000  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:9000
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 9001  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:9001
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 9001  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:9001
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 9443  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:9443
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 9443  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:9443
        # Turnkey ports: 12321, 12320
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 12321  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:12321
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 12321  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:12321
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 12320  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:12320
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 12320  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:12320
        # nginx :80, 81, 443
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 80  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:80
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 80  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:80
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 81  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:81
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 81  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:81
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 443  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:443
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 443  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:443
        # dns server :53 tcp/udp
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p udp --dport 53  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:53
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p udp --dport 53  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:53
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 53  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:53
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 53  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:53
	# MinioPorts 9000, 9001
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 9000  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:32778
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 9000  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:32778
        post-up   iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 9001  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:32777
        post-down iptables -t nat -D PREROUTING -i enp0s31f6 -p tcp --dport 9001  -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.3:32777
